markdownRemark.excerpt: What am I talking about, you ask? Well, its about my work life, if you feel excited, read on… If you don’t care, feel free to read on anyway, coz you may relate…
markdownRemark.html:
What am I talking about, you ask?

Well, its about my work life, if you feel excited, read on… If you don’t care, feel free to read on anyway, coz you may relate to it at some point.
